div.p:
Templates are rather simple for now : they consist in already existing POM files that user can import into Eclipse.
POM Templates are managed (added or removed) from the Mevenide 'Templates' preference pages (Screenshot 1).
Screenshot 1 Templates Management
Importing a POM file as a template stores it into Mevenide Location State and it can then be referenced in wizards (such pom or project creation).
Directions - In the future more sophisticated template management will be possible - such as complete project structure definition.
